name: Square and Circle
description:
Square and Circle are the best of friends, and they never go anywhere without one another.  Now they've found themselves lost in a dangerous world. Help them  rocket jump their way home! 

Controls:

Mouse - Aim

Click - Fire Rocket

R - Retry Level

Escape - Quit Game

This game was made for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam.  There were going to be way more levels, but time moved faster than I had hoped. Hope you enjoy!
